CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: These results indicate that the PCEs of the photovoltaic devices based on PDTP-DT2BT : PC 70 BM were higher than those of PDTP - DTBT : PC 70 BM and PDTP-BT : PC 70 BM.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PDTP-DT2BT : PC 70 BM |
| PDTP - DTBT : PC 70 BM |
| PDTP-BT : PC 70 BM |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PDTP-DT2BT : PC 70 BM |
| PDTP - DTBT : PC 70 BM |
| PDTP-BT : PC 70 BM |

These entities are clearly referring to specific types of photovoltaic devices, each with different combinations of materials PDTP-DT2BT, PDTP-DTBT, and PDTP-BT, and PC 70 BM.

These entities refer to the power conversion efficiencies of photovoltaic devices made with different materials (PDTP-DT2BT : PC 70 BM, PDTP-DTBT : PC 70 BM, and PDTP-BT : PC 70 BM).
